title: Sorrentino Says CARES Act Supports Small Businesses
itunes:title: Sorrentino Says CARES Act Supports Small Businesses
description:
Frank Sorrentino, CEO at ConnectOne Bank, discusses the signing of the CARES Act bill to create stimulus in response to the coronavirus outbreak. He says aiding small businesses is the best way to keep things moving in the economy.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
